mapper.sql: id, project_id, iteration_id, parent_id, title, description, type, priority, assignee_id, status, plan_start_date, plan_end_date, actual_start_date, actual_end_date, estimate_hours, create_user_id, update_user_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT FROM gsms_task WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.project_id, t.iteration_id, t.title, t.description, t.type, t.priority, t.assignee_id, t.status, t.plan_start_date, t.plan_end_date, t.actual_start_date, t.actual_end_date, t.estimate_hours, t.create_user_id, t.update_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.is_deleted FROM gsms_task t INNER JOIN gsms_project_member pm ON t.project_id = pm.project_id AND pm.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.is_deleted = 0 AND pm.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT FROM gsms_task WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gsms_task(project_id, iteration_id, parent_id, title, description, type, priority, assignee_id, status, plan_start_date, plan_end_date, estimate_hours, create_user_id, update_user_id) VALUES(#{projectId}, #{iterationId}, #{parentId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.handlers.MybatisEnumTypeHandler}, #{priority, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.handlers.MybatisEnumTypeHandler}, #{assigneeId}, #{status, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.handlers.MybatisEnumTypeHandler}, #{planStartDate}, #{planEndDate}, #{estimateHours}, #{createUserId}, #{updateUserId})
mapper.update: UPDATE gsms_task SET status = #{status, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.handlers.MybatisEnumTypeHandler}, actual_start_date = #{actualStartDate}, actual_end_date = #{actualEndDate}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE gsms_task SET is_deleted = 1, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.project_id, p.name as project_name, t.iteration_id, i.name as iteration_name, t.parent_id, t.title, t.description, t.type, t.priority, t.assignee_id, t.status, t.plan_start_date, t.plan_end_date, t.actual_start_date, t.actual_end_date, t.estimate_hours, t.create_user_id, t.update_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.is_deleted FROM gsms_task t INNER JOIN gsms_project_member pm ON t.project_id = pm.project_id AND pm.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gsms_project p ON t.project_id = p.id AND p.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN gsms_iteration i ON t.iteration_id = i.id AND i.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t.parent_id = #{parentId} AND t.is_deleted = 0 AND pm.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
